allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: MyPredictify football prediction SaaS

Next.js 16 + TypeScript + shadcn/ui + Drizzle ORM + Neon PostgreSQL.
Includes prediction pipeline, SportMonks integration, Elo/Poisson models,
ACCA builder, and GW25 predictions data.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Set default site URL to mypredictify.com

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix AccessDenied: don''t block sign-in if DB call fails

The signIn callback was returning false when getOrCreateUser threw,
which happens if DATABASE_URL is missing or tables don''t exist yet.
Now lets users through regardless and creates their record later.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
